channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 04:13 Air Alarm to Lviv Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 04:13 Air Alarm to Lviv Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Lviv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
